title: Thanksgiving Day NFL Preview, Picks, Analysis (Football 11/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson on the Pick Six podcast to preview Thanksgiving football including Bills-Cowboys (6:00), Saints-Falcons (18:30) and Bears-Lions (24:30). The guys also take a look at the 2020 NFL Draft while breaking down Justin Herbert (32:00) and who to watch during rivalry weekend in college football (43:30). 

 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
